verses.roman:
nāṭaśālā dhui' dhuila catvara-prāṅgaṇa
pākaśālā-ādi kari' karila prakṣālana

synonyms: nāṭa-śālā—the meeting place; dhui'—washing; dhuila—washed; catvara-prāṅgaṇa—the yard and the raised sitting place; pāka-śālā—the kitchen; ādi—and so on; kari'—making; karila prakṣālana—washed.
translation: In this way the meeting place was washed, the entire yard, the raised sitting places, the kitchen and every other room.
